option.value:
I'm Please code this update for my plugin:
Context:
Origins Reborn Roleplay Plugin Summary Create a plugin that can actively allow players to develop a/multiple roleplay characters that can synchronize across multiple servers via database and allow live editing to them. The character will have the ability to write the character to discord in #lore channel. The player should be able to edit fields Requirements Minecraft ● Allow creating multiple characters ● Characters consist of a name to identify them ● Can use commands to type for shorterfields OR populate via anvil GUI to type ○ Such as name, eye color, etc ● Long fields use MC book to type up. ○ May need to set a hard charlimit ● Can edit fields on demand ○ Name can stay static unless we want a different identifier ● Papi Support ○ Works for short fields and the characters current name ● Geyser Support (Optional/Future) ○ Shows via geyser cumulus instead of MC chest for GUI
Lets go down the list logically from most to least important

In my plugins AnvilGUI class im attempting to use Anvil GUI to update a characters name and update the Database with the new name provided in the database.
When i run the command to open the character name editor (the anvilgui) it works up until has to use the save logic. Pressing the paper result does not work. Am i missing something? Can you update/remake/improve this for me?

In my plugins AnvilGUI class im attempting to use Anvil GUI to update a characters name and update the Database with the new name provided in the database.
When i run the command to open the character name editor (the anvilgui) it works up until has to use the save logic. Pressing the paper result does not work. Am i missing something? Can you update/remake/improve this for me?
on a scale of 1/10 how would you rate my code? and what would you assume my proficiency is
lets focus on 1,2 3 and 4 can you update the code to reflect those changes?
